taskDescription: The major product formed by intramolecular aldol cyclization of 2,5-heptanedione (Problem 23-51) has two singlet absorptions in the 1H NMR spectrum, at 1.65 δ and 1.90 δ, and has no absorptions in the range 3 to 10 δ. What is its structure?
